Okay sent you an invite.Also anyone who attacks other nations ,even if there in an alliance or not will be considered a rouge nation ,and kicked.Since Asians almost caused a alliance war with PEST GDI ,and the Alien Alliance.Also i think we need more kerbal based named nations in our alliance.

OKAY, let's have a made-up founding story of Kethane Nation. (No one knew what happened to Kerbonisia, and the descendants of Kerbonisia didn't want to tell the past. So here is the approximate interpretation of what happened to the nation.)

Without their leader, Kerbonisia soon collapsed as the civil war began to develop. Each regions were now controlled by different leaders, and, as wars raged on, life became worse. Lives were lost.

The war was not over until the leaders negotiated and compromised on a government controlled by military leaders. The compromise was passed, however being a confederacy, the government was inept in stabilizing the countries. Soon another civil war broke out, this time the people rose up against the rebels.

The Americans were wary of war, but they are debating as war continued. Naturally, the Americans sided with the revolutionaries. (Read the American Revolutionary War and you'll see why.) Americans began to provide materiel for the democratic rebels (rebels favoring democracy). That caused the terrorist group (which was thought to have been decimated during a sweep done by the former government of Kerbonisia) to sided with the regimes, but it didn't help them a bit.

Eventually the country falls into the hands of the Rebels, and Kerbollo (leading the democratic rebels) took over as the leader, announcing the creation of the Kethane Nation and set it toward democratic paths.

==================================================================================

This is approximate, but it is not completely true. Instead, there could be parts that are left out during the civil wars period.
